text: 22.25: Mk 10.42-4522.25: Mt 20.25-27; Mk 10.42-44Mbe ne nzuav wari daaim, Zisas khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde khueŋ kaŋgiri, harigi ŋguia vhɨrver ki gumgi gu mbigi gari gumgir pani, mbe zɨ bakɨme kav, mbe guigira won gumgi gu mbigi gari. Mbe guigira mbe garav, mbe vhɨra khueŋ vuzvugi, mben gumgi gu mbigi kha ndɨkndɨgar mbe mbui, mbe tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi ma.
